WorkItem.Description:
How to retrieve a Complex Type when executing a ESql command using EntityCommand and EntityDataReader. I defined in the Entity Model (Northwind database) a complex type containing the postal code and the city field of the customer entity. In the code below how can I convert the object objPostalcodeCity of type DbDataRecord to the Edm defined type "PostalcodeCity" ?
Â 
Using conn As New EntityConnection("name=NorthwindEntities")
	Dim strESQL As String = "SELECT VALUE cust FROM NorthwindEntities.Customers as cust WHERE cust.CustomerID = 'ALFKI'"
	conn.Open()
	Dim cmd As EntityCommand = conn.CreateCommand()
	cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text
	cmd.CommandText = strESQL
	Using drd As EntityDataReader = cmd.ExecuteReader(System.Data.CommandBehavior.SequentialAccess)
		While drd.Read()
			Dim custID As String = drd.GetString(0)
			Dim objPostalcodeCity As DbDataRecord = drd.GetValue(9)
		End While
	End Using
End Using
WorkItem.Summary: Returns Complex Type object when using EntityDataReader
